specialRules.hint: When the hero and her unit are activated pick one of the following devotions, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Passion: +3” when moving • Guidance: AP(+1) when shooting • Spirit: AP(+1) when in melee • Aegis: enemies get -1 to melee hits Canticle Megaphone: This model and her unit get the Fearless rule.
specialRules.name: Blind Faith
specialRules.label: Blind Faith
specialRules.description: When the hero and her unit are activated pick one of the following devotions, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Passion: +3” when moving • Guidance: AP(+1) when shooting • Spirit: AP(+1) when in melee • Aegis: enemies get -1 to melee hits Canticle Megaphone: This model and her unit get the Fearless rule.

specialRules.hint: This model gets +1 to its attack rolls for melee and shooting.

specialRules.hint: This model and her unit get the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.description: This model and her unit get the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.hint: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.
specialRules.name: Shield Wall

specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.hint: The hero and her unit get AP(+1) and +1 attack in melee.

specialRules.description: The hero and her unit get AP(+1) and +1 attack in melee.

spells.name: Holy Tears
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Poison in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Eternal Flame
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Heretics
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to defense next time it takes hits.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: Litanies
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately shoot.

spells.name: Righteous Wrath
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 12” take 3 hits with AP(2) each.
